translation.en: -[Jayce] You wanted to see me, Professor? -[Heimerdinger] Ah. Come in, Jayce.
-[door closes] -[Heimerdinger] Can you believe it?
Our city is about to turn 200 years old.
A bicentennial.
It's shaping up to be an amazing Progress Day.
translation.ko: 아주 멋진 진보의 날이 될 것 같군요

translation.en: "Stanwick Padidly"? Huh, I don't know much about him.
Everything he built either exploded, melted, or toppled over.
translation.ko: 스탠윅의 모든 발명품은 폭발하거나, 녹거나, 무너졌다네

translation.en: And yet, here he stands.
Stanwick set his personal ambitions aside
and focused on something far more important.
Our future.
He realized nothing he could accomplish
could compare to the contributions of his students.
translation.ko: 제자들의 업적과 비교할 수 없다는 걸 알았지

translation.en: I had no idea.
[Heimerdinger] That was his sacrifice.
A dear friend.
The Council has recommended you give the Progress Day speech this year.
translation.ko: 의회는 올해 진보의 날 연설을 자네가 하길 바라고 있어

translation.en: What… But you always give that speech.
[chuckles] I… I could never take your place.
translation.ko: 그 연설은 매년 교수님이 하시잖아요 제가 대신할 순 없어요

translation.en: I agree with them.
Your Hexgates have done wonders for our city.
translation.ko: 자네의 마법공학 정거장은 놀라운 일을 해냈어

translation.en: Brought scholars from distant lands. Reignited passions in arts and science.
translation.ko: 먼 곳에서 학자들을 데려오고 예술과 과학의 열정을 되살리지 않았나

translation.en: You deserve this honor.
I… I will do my best to make Piltover proud, Professor.
[Heimerdinger] It's short notice, I know,
but perhaps there's something in the lab you might be able to share?
translation.ko: 혹시 연설 때 공개할 만한 새로운 기술은 없나?

translation.en: People love a grand reveal.
Viktor and I have just the thing. The next chapter of Hextech.
translation.ko: 딱 좋은 게 있어요 마법공학의 다음 장이죠

translation.en: Come to the lab this afternoon, I'll show you.
I'll look forward to it.
You certainly have something to live up to, my boy.
[robot 1] Happy Progress Day. Happy Progress Day.
[Mrs. Kiramman] Our most famous protégé, Jayce Talis.
translation.ko: 필트오버에서 가장 유명한 인재 제이스 탈리스입니다

translation.en: The visionary behind the Hexgates,
a beacon of trade and prosperity for our great City of Progress.
translation.ko: 우리 진보의 도시가 무역과 번성을 누릴 수 있게 한 장본인이죠

translation.en: Excuse me.
Sorry, sorry. Yeah. Excuse me.
-He's a very busy man. -[sighs]
-Cait. -Serves you right.
You still avoiding her?
I'm working. Oh, I can see that.
I mean, there's so much crime to thwart outside your family's tent.
translation.ko: 하긴, 너희 가문 전시장 근처엔 워낙 범죄자가 득실대니까

translation.en: I can only imagine the strings she pulled to have me posted here.
translation.ko: 날 여기 발령 나게 하려고 얼마나 연줄을 대셨을까?

translation.en: It's your fault really,
for not following her into a career "more befitting your station."
translation.ko: 가문의 수준에 맞는 직업을 택하길 원하셨잖아

translation.en: She'd do anything to keep me from seeing the real world.
translation.ko: 날 세상에서 떼어 놓으려고 별짓을 다 하시지

translation.en: Well, at least you'll have front-row seats to the speech.
translation.ko: 그래도 연설은 맨 앞에서 들을 수 있겠네

translation.en: Speech?
Mm-hmm. I'm giving the big address tonight.
Hmm. We really have descended to anarchy.
Have fun herding the drunkards.
Happy Progress Day.
Uh, shipping manifest?
From your friend. Downtown.
[man 1] Let's go!
[man 2] Ah, shit. The Firelights.
[Firelight Leader] We have five minutes till they're out of there.
[lieutenant] You ever seen this much Shimmer before?
[Firelight Leader] They're expanding. Check for more below. Burn it all.
translation.ko: 점점 더 늘어나고 있어 아래층도 찾아봐 다 태워버려

translation.en: -[both gasp] -[punk 1] Oh, no, no, no, no, no. Open up.
Open the door. [grumbles]
[lieutenant] Oh, no. She's here.
Hi.
Vi?
[Vi] I can't lose you.
[Powder] Why did you leave me?
[Vi] Because you're a jinx.
-[Powder] I want to fight. -[Vi] You're not ready.
translation.ko: - 나도 싸울래 - 넌 아직 안 돼!

translation.en: [Firelight Leader] No.
You were supposed to guard the cargo.
[Viktor] You think he will approve?
[Jayce] Heimerdinger believes science should be used to improve lives as much as we do.
translation.ko: 하이머딩거 교수님도 과학으로 삶을 개선해야 한다고 믿으셔

translation.en: We just need to show him it's safe.
And what about the Council?
We stabilized the crystal like they asked.
Built the Hexgates like they asked.
[Jayce] It's our turn to decide the future of Hextech.
translation.ko: 이젠 우리가 마법공학의 미래를 정해야 해

translation.en: [Jayce] Professor. I'm so glad you could make it.
Wouldn't miss it for the world, my boy. What do we have on the docket?
translation.ko: 이런 기회는 절대 놓칠 수 없지 그래서 뭘 준비했나?

translation.en: [Jayce] It all began with this.
[Jayce] A crystal of magical energy,
too volatile to be handled outside our workshops.
Hextech was supposed to bring magic into the life of the common man.
translation.ko: 마법공학은 서민들도 마법을 누리기 위해 만들어졌죠

translation.en: And now, it finally can.
A Hextech Gemstone.
-[Jayce grunts, screams] -[stammers] Wait.
Holy sprockets.
[Viktor] We've found a means to fortify the crystals.
This new version is stable and absolutely safe.
translation.ko: 이 새로운 유형의 원석은 안정적이며 매우 안전하죠

translation.en: We present to you the next chapter of Hextech.
We can now design portable devices.
translation.ko: 이제 이동식 장비도 설계할 수 있습니다

translation.en: [grunts] The Gemstone can power virtually anything.
translation.ko: 말 그대로 뭐든지 가동시킬 수 있어요

translation.en: The Atlas Gauntlets. [huffs]
The mining colonies in the fissures can work faster and without fatigue.
translation.ko: 이거면 광부들도 지치지 않고 더 빨리 일할 수 있죠

translation.en: The Hex Claw.
[Viktor] A mechanical arm, equipped with a powerful ray of light.
translation.ko: 이 기계 팔에는 강력한 광선이 장착되어 있습니다

translation.en: Imagine what our artificers could do with such a device.
translation.ko: 우리 장인들이 이걸로 뭘 만들어낼지 상상해 보세요

translation.en: I want Hextech to be a tool for us to build a new world.
translation.ko: 마법공학은 새로운 세상을 세울 도구가 될 거예요

translation.en: -And now, it's finally possible. -[whimpers]
translation.ko: 드디어 그 꿈을 이룰 수 있게 됐죠

translation.en: Anyway, this is our presentation.
Quite amazing, gentlemen. You should be very proud.
translation.ko: 이거 상당히 놀랍군, 제군들 아주 자랑스러워해야 마땅해

translation.en: Obviously, there are a few kinks to iron out and screws to be tightened,
translation.ko: 물론 고치고 개선해야 할 점이 좀 눈에 띄긴 하지만

translation.en: but give it a decade of careful research, and it will be ready.
translation.ko: 십 년만 더 연구하면 준비될 것 같군!

translation.en: A decade?
Oh, don't worry, my boy. It zips past you in the blink of an eye.
translation.ko: 걱정할 것 없어 그쯤은 눈 깜짝할 사이에 지나가니까

translation.en: With respect, Professor.
We can be improving lives with Hextech now.
translation.ko: 지금 당장이라도 삶을 개선할 수 있는데요

translation.en: A breakthrough like this takes time, Viktor.
Putting that kind of power into everyone's hands is dangerous.
translation.ko: 게다가 모두에게 이런 힘을 쥐여주는 건 위험해

translation.en: Keep at it and I'm sure you will discover a way
to safeguard Hextech against misuse.
There must've been four, five of them. I don't know how they got inside.
translation.ko: 네다섯 명 정도 됐습니다 어떻게 들어왔는진 몰라요

translation.en: You're from the undercity.
I didn't do anything. She's crazy.
translation.ko: 난 잘못한 거 없어 그 여자는 미쳤어!

translation.en: -[grunts] -Easy.
She shot me.
Who shot you? Who were you working for?
translation.ko: 누가 널 쐈지? 너 누구 밑에서 일해?

translation.en: -I can't. He'll kill me. -Who?
translation.ko: 말 못 해, 날 죽일 거야 누가?

translation.en: -[groans] -[Caitlyn] I can protect you.
[Marcus] Caitlyn Kiramman, why does that not surprise me?
Interfering in an investigation, again.
You're supposed to be guarding your mother's tent.
I was, Sheriff, but she doesn't need it. And clearly, this takes priority.
translation.ko: 그쪽을 지키고 있었는데 별 필요가 없어서요 이쪽이 더 중요해 보였어요

translation.en: I realize you're used to getting your way, Kiramman,
translation.ko: 뭐든 자네 뜻대로 하는 데 익숙하겠지만

translation.en: but we have a chain of command for a reason.
translation.ko: 지휘 체계가 괜히 있는 게 아니야

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I understand.
But there's more going on here than just the smuggling.
translation.ko: 하지만 이건 단순한 밀수 사건이 아니에요

translation.en: -If I could just question him I could-- -[Marcus] I'll take it from here.
translation.ko: - 저자를 신문할 기회를 주시면… - 내가 처리하지

translation.en: Since you're looking for more work,
you can take the graveyard shift tonight at the fair.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 축제 때 야간조로 근무하게

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Good.
I want this one on a boat to Stillwater prison.
[enforcer] Yes, sir.
She fired on us.
[Silco] There are always mishaps in battle.
The Firelights were her target and most are dead.
It wasn't a mishap, she froze up and lost her shit.
I could've handled those brats.
-She's a problem and we all know it. -[Silco] We?
translation.ko: 저 계집은 골칫거리인 거 우리 모두 알잖아요 우리?

translation.en: Who's we?
I expect better from you than excuses.
It was your job to make sure things went smoothly.
translation.ko: 네 임무는 일을 매끄럽게 처리하는 거였어

translation.en: You failed. Don't disappoint me again.
The world's growing smaller every day, thanks to the Hexgates.
translation.ko: 날이 갈수록 세상이 좁아져 가 그놈의 마법공학 정거장 때문에

translation.en: And now, we're cut off.
The topsiders are leaving us further and further behind.
translation.ko: 윗동네 놈들은 점점 더 앞서 나가고 있다고

translation.en: What happened?
[Jinx] She already told you.
I'm asking you.
[Jinx] One of those Firelight wackos was a girl.
translation.ko: 점화단 놈들 중 한 명이 여자였는데

translation.en: -With pink hair. -[Silco] Hmm…
translation.ko: 점화단 놈들 중 한 명이 여자였는데 머리가 분홍색이었어요

translation.en: Your sister's gone.
You know that as well as I do.
I know. I know. Sisters, right? [chuckles]
You can't live with 'em, can't stuff 'em back in the ol' babymaker.
translation.ko: 있어도 문제, 없어도 문제 반품할 수도 없고요

translation.en: Today's screw-up will set us back weeks.
translation.ko: 오늘 실수로 계획이 몇 주나 지연됐어

translation.en: I'm sorry.
-I need to know that I can rely on you. -Phew.
I'm doing this for us, Jinx. All of us.
translation.ko: 다 우릴 위해서야, 징크스 우리 모두를 위해서지

translation.en: The sons and daughters of Zaun deserve more than their runoff.
translation.ko: 자운의 아들과 딸들은 누구보다 많은 걸 누릴 자격이 있어

translation.en: It won't happen again.
[Silco] I know.
Sevika will clean up today's mess.
Sevika? That ogre couldn't clean a dust bunny with a blowtorch.
translation.ko: 세비카요? 덩치만 크지 토치로 실오라기 하나 못 태울걸요

translation.en: She'll suffice. You should focus on your gadgetry.
translation.ko: 알아서 잘할 거야 그동안 넌 장비 개발에 집중해

translation.en: Take some time.
[stammers] I don't need time.
Take it anyhow.
[Elora] Fundraiser's going well.
Your mother would be proud.
Hmm… Would she? [Elora] Tired of mingling?
[Mel] Hmm. These people have nothing new to offer me.
translation.ko: 저 사람들은 전혀 새로울 게 없거든

translation.en: The only one actually worth my time is him.
translation.ko: 어울릴 가치가 있는 건 저 사람뿐이지

translation.en: The golden boy. [Elora chuckles]
Ah, he's won Piltover's heart.
Oh, speak of the devil.
Could I borrow you for a minute?
[Mel] To what do I owe the pleasure?
It's Heimerdinger.
[Mel scoffs] When is it not?
[Jayce] We've shown him our research. He thinks we need more time.
It's Progress Day.
Representatives from all over the world
have come to see what new wonders the City of Progress has to offer.
translation.ko: 진보의 도시가 제안하는 첨단 문물을 보러 왔어요

translation.en: If there's a time to present a new creation, it is now.
translation.ko: 그러니 새로운 발명품을 발표한다면 바로 지금이죠

translation.en: Great.
Heimerdinger is a great scientist. But he's old. He only ever sees the past.
translation.ko: 하이머딩거는 위대한 과학자지만 이제는 늙었죠 늘 과거만 바라보고요

translation.en: Piltover needs a leader who looks forward.
Someone like you. You really believe that?
Hextech has the potential to change everything.
translation.ko: 마법공학은 모든 걸 변화시킬 가능성을 지녔어요

translation.en: The world is ready.
And I've already spoken to several potential investors.
Investors?
Of course. [chuckling] Everyone wants Hextech for themselves.
It's your speech.
Give the people a glimpse of the future.
It wasn't her.
It wasn't.
I know. Just… just some wannabe street trash.
translation.ko: 나도 알아, 그냥 개폼이나 잡는 쓰레기였어

translation.en: I got confused, that's all.
Now, he thinks I'm weak.
"Sevika will clean it up."
Sevika's a regular Johnny-on-the-spot.
I'm not weak.
And I'm gonna show him.
Oh, I'm gonna show him. You'll see.
Where were you?
They were asking if I could do the address.
translation.ko: 나한테 대신 연설할 수 있는지 묻더군

translation.en: You should come up with me. We're partners.
No, no. Not in front of all of them…
You… have your speech prepared?
[Mrs. Kiramman] An inspiration to Piltover's future
and that of all humanity.
Please join me in welcoming to the stage…
-Jayce Talis. -Guess it's time.
-[crowd applauding] -[grand music plays]
Uh, good evening.
I know many of you probably didn't expect to see me here today.
translation.ko: 제가 오늘 연단에 서서 놀라셨을지도 모릅니다

translation.en: And believe me, I'm just as shocked as you are.
My family and I are simple people. In our factory, we made hammers.
translation.ko: 저는 소박한 가문 출신입니다 가업으로 해머를 만들었죠

translation.en: They were probably used to cut the stones you're standing on right now.
translation.ko: 아마 지금 서 계신 곳도 그 해머로 만들었을 겁니다

translation.en: No one in my life expected very much of me.
translation.ko: 주변의 그 누구도 제게 큰 기대를 걸지 않았죠

translation.en: And that is precisely what makes this moment so extraordinary.
translation.ko: 바로 그런 이유로 지금, 이 순간이 더 특별한 겁니다

translation.en: A few years ago, the Hexgates opened their ports to the world
translation.ko: 겨우 몇 년 전 마법공학 정거장이 개설됐고

translation.en: and made Piltover prosper beyond anything we could have ever imagined.
translation.ko: 필트오버는 상상을 초월하는 부를 누리게 됐습니다

translation.en: But… we're not done yet.
This year, we've created something new for you.
Something that… um…
That we will share with you…
…when the time is right.
Things that will bring an end to your hardships.
Whether you're the scion of our high houses,
or an honest laborer from the underground.
We vow to keep pressing forward, for we are the City of Progress.
translation.ko: 우린 계속 전진할 겁니다 이곳은 진보의 도시니까요

translation.en: And our future is bright.
[duty captain] That it, then?
I thought that Talis boy was some kind of genius.
Last year, didn't he launch a blimp halfway across the continent?
[Caitlyn] Airship, actually.
An airship has a rigid metal hull. It's not a blimp.
translation.ko: 동체가 금속이면 비행정이 아니라 비행선이라고 해요

translation.en: It's a balloon, ain't it? Sure as hell looks that way.
Pardon us, if we aren't quite so refined as you, milady.
translation.ko: 저흰 미천한 놈들이라 교양이 좀 부족합니다, 마님

translation.en: [female enforcer] What are you even doing here, Kiramman?
translation.ko: 여긴 뭐 하러 온 거야 키라먼?

translation.en: Don't you have a cocktail party to attend?
[Caitlyn] Fire. Fire!
-[enforcer 2] What's happening? -Get the fire brigade.
[baby voice] Help. In here, please. Help me.
Help. It's so hot, please. I'm trapped.
I'm a helpless little girl, and I've set the building on fire.
translation.ko: 전 힘없는 아이예요 실수로 건물에 불을 질렀어요

translation.en: [altered voice] By accident. Totally by accident.
Get out. Now.
[altered voice] Also, I brought this dynamite.
Goodbye.
[Viktor] The Gemstone is gone.
translation.ko: "즐거운 진보의 날 되세요" 원석이 사라졌어요 연구 자료도 일부 사라졌고요

translation.en: Along with some of our research papers.
translation.ko: 원석이 사라졌어요 연구 자료도 일부 사라졌고요

translation.en: [Marcus] The situation is still developing.
No one in the undercity has claimed responsibility yet.
translation.ko: 아직은 지하도시 놈들 중 용의자가 없어요

translation.en: How did it come to this?
Hmm. For too long has the underground been left unchecked.
translation.ko: 너무 오랫동안 아랫동네를 풀어준 것 같군

translation.en: [Shoola] We've lost touch.
They may not be your preferred constituents,
but they're still our people.
The undercity cannot be controlled. Not by us.
translation.ko: 지하도시를 우리 힘으로 통제하는 건 불가능해요

translation.en: So where does that leave us?
[Bolbok] Mr. Talis?
Could the trenchers build a weapon with the stolen crystal?
translation.ko: 하수구 인생들이 그 수정으로 무기를 만들 수 있소?

translation.en: [Hoskel] Shimmer, body replacements…
translation.ko: 시머에, 신체 개조에… 그자들의 재간이 어떤지 잘 봤잖소

translation.en: We've seen their ingenuity over the years, of course, they can.
translation.ko: 시머에, 신체 개조에… 그자들의 재간이 어떤지 잘 봤잖소 당연히 할 수 있겠지!

translation.en: If the right person got a hold of it,
it's possible they could utilize its energy.
translation.ko: 충분히 그 힘을 활용할 수 있죠

translation.en: We need to address this immediately.
I agree.
It was my responsibility to safeguard this technology and I failed.
translation.ko: 전 이 기술을 지키고 보호할 의무를 다하지 못했습니다

translation.en: My mistake cost people their lives.
I have come before you to recommend that we suspend all Hextech operations
translation.ko: 이번 사태가 수습될 때까지 당분간 모든 마법공학 시설의 운영을 중단해주세요

translation.en: until the situation is resolved.
translation.ko: 당분간 모든 마법공학 시설의 운영을 중단해주세요

translation.en: Including our laboratories, the refinery and the Hexgates.
Have you lost your mind?
[Shoola] The Hexgates must remain open.
Piltover's status as a global shipping lane depends on it.
translation.ko: 국제적 무역 도시인 필트오버의 지위가 달려있어요

translation.en: Thousands would lose their income.
But shouldn't the safety of Piltover be our first priority?
translation.ko: 그래도 필트오버의 안전이 그보다 중요하지 않을까요?

translation.en: You would sacrifice your life's work?
Without the Hexgates, my goods cannot reach foreign markets till winter.
translation.ko: 마법공학 정거장이 없으면 올겨울에나 시장에 내 물건이 도착할 거요!

translation.en: Am I to tell the Noxians their next shipment of wine will be vinegar?
translation.ko: 녹서스인들에게 와인 대신 식초를 보낸다고 하라는 건가?

translation.en: [Mel] Councilors. It appears we are at an impasse.
If we shut down the Hexgates, the city will suffer.
translation.ko: 마법공학 정거장을 닫으면 도시가 피해를 보겠죠

translation.en: But if we do nothing,
we leave ourselves vulnerable to malefactors.
More lives may be lost.
Perhaps the time has come to explore a more radical solution.
translation.ko: 아무래도 더 급진적인 해결책을 고려할 때가 된 게 아닐까요?

translation.en: What are you suggesting?
Mr. Talis has demonstrated his commitment to our safety.
translation.ko: 탈리스 씨는 우리의 안전에 전념하겠다고 했어요

translation.en: He's willing to sacrifice his own enterprise.
translation.ko: 자신의 사업을 희생하는 한이 있더라도 말이죠

translation.en: And it seems to me only Mr. Talis
translation.ko: 그리고 제가 보기에는 마법공학을 보호할 지식을 지닌 사람은

translation.en: has the knowledge necessary to secure the Hexgates.
I propose that a new chair be brought forth,
and that House Talis be elevated to this august body.
translation.ko: 의회의 일원으로 승격시킬 것을 여러분께 제안합니다

translation.en: -What? -[Mel] As a Councilor,
translation.ko: 뭐요? 의원이 되면 우리의 투자 재산을 보호하는 데 필요한

translation.en: he will have the resources necessary to protect all our investments.
translation.ko: 의원이 되면 우리의 투자 재산을 보호하는 데 필요한 모든 재원이 제공되겠죠

translation.en: Councilor Medarda, this is highly irregular.
The Council has held seven seats for generations.
translation.ko: 이 의회는 오랫동안 7인 체제를 유지해 왔습니다

translation.en: [Bolbok] Does the boy have any experience?
translation.ko: 그에 걸맞은 경력이 있긴 한 거요?

translation.en: Only that of a scientist. Like Heimerdinger.
I believe Councilor Medarda is right.
Hextech security should be administered by a scientist.
translation.ko: 마법공학을 관리하는 건 과학자가 맡아야 하죠

translation.en: I second the motion.
[Mel] Well then, shall we vote?
Jinx!
Jinx! Jinx!
Jinx! That's me.
Half a dozen enforcers, dead. Enforcers. Dead.
translation.ko: 집행자들이 여섯 명이나 죽었어! 집행자들이 죽었다고!

translation.en: -Yeah… -[Silco] A building blown to pieces.
Oh, yeah. [chuckles]
Do you have any idea what you've done?
translation.ko: 네가 대체 무슨 짓을 한 건지 알기나 해?

translation.en: Actually, I do.
Happy Progress Day!
[Jayce] Hey.
How are you feeling?
I've had a break in the case. Shouldn't you be resting?
translation.ko: - 사건의 단서를 찾았어 - 쉬어야 하지 않아?

translation.en: While the trail is hot?
Listen, you know how I've suspected
there is a single mind behind the undercity's violence?
translation.ko: 내가 전에 추리했었잖아? 지하도시 범죄는 다 한 명이 기획한 거라고 멋진 음모론이지

translation.en: The great conspiracy.
I think whoever attacked the square is our suspect.
translation.ko: 내 생각엔 광장을 공격한 자가 용의자 같아

translation.en: The same symbols showed up at the botched smuggling operation at the Hexgates.
translation.ko: 정거장에서 밀수를 시도했던 자도 같은 상징을 남겼거든

translation.en: -The Hexgates? -Keep up.
All this time, they've kept their dealings localized to the undercity.
translation.ko: 그동안 그자들은 지하도시에서만 밀거래를 해 왔어

translation.en: Low priority. The attack on the square changes things.
translation.ko: 주요 사건은 못 되지 광장 습격 사건은 달랐어

translation.en: They've overstepped. If I can figure who made this,
translation.ko: 실수한 거야 이걸 만든 사람을 찾는다면

translation.en: it could lead me directly to whoever's behind it all.
translation.ko: 모든 사건의 주모자를 발견하게 될 거야

translation.en: The answer is here, staring me in the face.
translation.ko: 정답은 여기 있어 바로 내 코앞에 있지

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I can feel it.
How do you intend to prove any of this?
If I can just work this out. Marcus will have to listen.
translation.ko: 만약에 내가 답을 찾는다면 보안관님도 들어줄 거야

translation.en: [Jayce] If there's one thing I've learned about the Council,
translation.ko: 내가 의회에서 알게 된 점이 있다면

translation.en: they need more than just theories.
Since when did you concern yourself with the Council's opinion?
translation.ko: 언제부터 의회 의견에 신경을 썼다고 그래?

translation.en: Since I…
became a Councilor.
You're serious.
When? Why?
Have they discovered how to govern with grease and a spanner?
translation.ko: 기름때랑 스패너로 정치도 할 수 있나 봐?

translation.en: Ha ha. I was actually hoping you might consider joining my staff.
translation.ko: 사실은 너만 괜찮다면 내 밑에서 일해줬으면 하는데

translation.en: [Caitlyn] "House Talis Security."
That's a ceremonial position. I'd live behind a desk.
You almost died, Cait.
I just… I just want you to be safe.
Thanks, but I already have a job.
No. You don't.
After the attack, your parents spoke to the Sheriff.
This is the best I could do.
I don't need charity, Councilor. Yours or my parents'.
translation.ko: 자선 따윈 필요 없어요, 의원님 그걸 베푼 사람이 누구든지

translation.en: -Cait. -Get out.
[Caitlyn] I need to speak with one of the inmates.
Oh, folks in here aren't usually very talkative.
translation.ko: 여기 있는 친구들은 대체로 말이 적은데요

translation.en: This one was hit by friendly fire.
He's got reason to talk. Must have been sent in today?
translation.ko: 입을 열 만도 하죠 오늘 이송됐을 텐데요?

translation.en: Oh. Inmate 2135.
[warden] Yeah, I'm, uh, afraid that's not possible.
-Why not? -Uh, well, there's been…
-an incident. -[Caitlyn] What kind of incident?
-[warden] The… -[gasps, grunts] …not so pretty kind.
[Caitlyn] You don't understand, I have to talk to him.
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 꼭 만나야 해요

translation.en: [warden] Oh, you'll be able to. As soon as he can move his jaw again.
translation.ko: 그럼요, 만날 수야 있죠 다시 턱을 움직일 수 있게 되면요

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Who assaulted him?
Who the hell are you?
